articles.title: 3rd Meeting of KPA Battalion Commanders and Political Instructors Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
3rd Meeting of KPA Battalion Commanders and Political Instructors Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
  Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- There took place in Pyongyang with splendor the 3rd meeting of battalion commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Oct. 3 and 4.
					 The meeting marked a new landmark in preserving and glorifying forever the idea of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu on attaching importance to battalions and their exploits performed in  army-building and reinforcing the battalions as required by the modeling of the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. It was of weighty importance in ushering in a heyday of bolstering up the military power by arousing all service personnel to the struggle to train the battalions as elite guards units of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong and other KPA commanding officers, battalion commanders and political instructors, etc.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the venue of the meeting.
					
					 He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the participants and sent a warm salute to them.
					
					 The report was made by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau.
					
					 The reporter said the annals of the Songun revolution which was started and triumphed by dint of arms under the banner of the Juche idea are associated with the tireless efforts made by the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and the loving care shown by them for consolidating the battalions of the KPA.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who provided a precious tradition of reinforcing the battalions in the crucible of the bloody anti-Japanese war, directed primary efforts to reinforcing the battalions politically and militarily from the early period of building a revolutionary regular armed forces, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 During the past Fatherland Liberation War he appointed many anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters as commanding officers of the battalions and wisely led the battalions to fulfill their roles in achieving the victory in the war.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il gave a unique definition that a battalion is the lowest commanding unit of the KPA and its basic combat unit and independent unit for service. He enunciated the idea of giving importance to battalions that the overall combat capability of the KPA will be bolstered up in every way only when the battalions are reinforced.
					
					 At the second meeting of battalion commanders and political instructors, he set it as the basic duty of the battalion commanders and political instructors to make battalions elite and invincible combat ranks and led them with loving care to play the roles of central figures in reinforcing the battalions and twin pillars supporting them so that all of them might become a-match-for-hundred ones.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to battalions and their cause of army-building are being successfully carried forward and developed on a new higher stage under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The future of the DPRK is immensely rosy and it is sure to win its final victory as it has Kim Jong Un at the helm of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Then followed speeches by KPA general and officers.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 He said that the third meeting of KPA battalion commanders and political instructors marked an epochal occasion as it provided an important landmark in fully applying Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to battalions and their idea of reinforcing them to army building and military activities and ushering in a heyday of bolstering up the military muscle.
					
					  He referred to the importance of the position and duties of the battalions in increasing the military capability.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to turn all battalions into invincible elite combat ranks capable of beating back any formidable enemy at one blow and dear old homes of service personnel linked with the yard of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 He underlined the need to steadily improve the contents and modes of training as required by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's military idea of strategy and tactics, Juche-based war methods, combat duties of units and sub-units and modern war.
					
					 He instructed commanding officers to embody Kim Jong Il-style outlook on service personnel, take warm care of their living and lead them as their real parents would do. 
					
					 In order to reinforce the battalions it is necessary to decisively increase the responsibility and role of the battalion commanders and political instructors, he noted.
					
					 Battalion commanders and political instructors should work on the basis of strengthening companies from A to Z, he said, adding battalions and companies are like one organic body and it can be said that reinforcing companies precisely means strengthening battalions.
					
					 He set it as an important way for bringing about a fresh change in strengthening battalions to raise a hot wind of mass movement and competition.
					
					 Stressing the need for the entire army to attach importance to battalions and sincerely help them, he called for building well the ranks of battalion commanders and political instructors and putting forward them and settling knotty problems arising in the battalion work in a responsible manner.
					
					 He ardently appealed to them to dynamically struggle with indomitable faith to bring earlier the day of successfully completing the Korean revolution made under the leadership Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, bearing deep in mind the slogan of faith "Do not abandon the revolutionary faith though one dies" which made the hearts of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners burn, the slogan in which their spirit still lives on in the hearts of the service personnel.
					
					 He concluded his speech. 
					
					 He said through the meeting he learned the commanding officers of the battalions who have devoted themselves to strengthening battalions are, indeed, patriots and unknown heroes, adding that the Party Central Committee is most highly proud of having these comrades.
					
					 He said that the Party Central Committed decided to highly praise them.
					
					 Then a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was read out by Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff.
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally awarded the title of DPRK labor hero and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class to KPA officers Pang Kyong Chol, Choe Tong Yun, Han Chol Su, Kim Chol Ho and Sin Ye Gun, commanding officers of battalions, who performed distinguished feats.
					
					 He expressed the conviction that all battalion commanders and political instructors would creditably live up to the expectation of the party by further reinforcing the battalions, the basic combat units of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in 3rd Meeting of KPA Battalion Commanders and Political Instructors
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in 3rd Meeting of KPA Battalion Commanders and Political Instructors
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants in the 3rd meeting of battalion commanders and political instructors of KPA on Tuesday. 
					 Kim Jong Un acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers and sent warm greetings to battalion commanders and political instructors dedicating their wisdom, energies and passion to preparing servicepersons politically and militarily and building their dear old homes, being the masters for strengthening battalions and twin pillars of battalions.
					
					 He congratulated the participants on their successful meeting with a high sense of political awareness and revolutionary enthusiasm, saying that the third meeting in the history of army building offered a significant landmark in bringing about a heyday of increasing the military power by beefing up the political and military might of the battalions in every way under the banner of modeling the entire army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed the expectation and belief that the battalion commanders and political instructors would fulfill their honorable mission and duty in the work for building the battalions into the elite combat ranks and dear homes linking with the yard of the Central Committee of the Party as intended by it before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and other KPA commanding officers and those of the services and corps-level units of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Russian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Russian Figures
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by А. I. Belotynskii, general manager of the Spetsservispostavka Company Ltd., of Russia, and Zyomin Viktor Viktorovich, general manager of the Dalnestroi Company Unlimited of Russia.
					 They were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Russia and an official concerned.

articles.title: Malian President on Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Malian President on Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, president of the Republic of Mali, received credentials from Kim Jun Gap, DPRK ambassador to his country, on Oct. 24.
					 He said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the Malian government and people, heartily wish the fraternal Korean people greater successes in their efforts to build a thriving nation and reunify the country independently and peacefully under the wise guidance of the respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between Mali and the DPRK are a precious treasure provided by the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Modibo Keita, the first president of Mali.
					
					 Modibo Keita visited the DPRK in October 1964, met with Kim Il Sung and received his precious instructions, an important occasion in the political structure and economic development of the Malian society.
					
					 We will remember forever the sincere assistance rendered by Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il to the government and people of the independent Mali in the political, economic, cultural and all other fields.
					
					 I hope that the multilateral exchange and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Latvian President to Strengthen Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
Latvian President to Strengthen Cooperation with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Andris Berzins, president of the Republic of Latvia, received credentials from Kang Yong Dok, DPRK ambassador to his country, on Oct. 28.
					 The president wished the Korean people happiness and prosperity and greater successes in their drive to build economy and better the people's livelihood.
					
					 It is a good thing to further develop the relations between the two countries in the political, economic, cultural and all other fields though they are far away from each other geographically, he said, expressing the willingness to strengthen dialogue and cooperation in the future.

articles.title: Nationwide Philately Slated in DPRK
articles.content:
Nationwide Philately Slated in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A nationwide philately will be sponsored by the Korean Stamps Museum in the DPRK.
					 The philately aims at finding out and collecting used or disused stamps, postcards and envelops brought out in different ages of Korea, postal books and documents, postal seals, postmen's costumes, postal bags, photos of post offices, mail boxes, mail transportation means and printing machines and tools.
					
					 The fax and e-mail addresses of the Korean Stamps Museum are as follows:
					
					Fax: 850-2-381-2100/4410
					
					E-mail: stamp＠star-co.net.kp
					
					E-mail: stampdealer＠rocketmail.com

articles.title: New Health Drinks Developed
articles.content:
New Health Drinks Developed
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Microbiological Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has developed new health drinks made with Aronia melanocarpa fruits.
					 Aronia fruits are rich in various vitamins, sugar, organic acid, essential microelement, anthocyan, etc.
					
					 The institute succeeded in extracting vitamin P and other medicinal ingredients from the fruits for making health drinks.
					
					 The drinks prove effective in lowering cholesterol count and keeping normal blood pressure.
					
					 They are also taking good effect of preventing arteriosclerosis, heart disease, cerebral thrombosis and diabetes.

articles.title: Daily on Powerful Political Mode in Era of Independence
articles.content:
Daily on Powerful Political Mode in Era of Independence
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Songun (military-first) policy, pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), is a great and powerful political mode representing the independent politics as it provides invincible strength to deal a telling blow at the dominationist forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, stresses this in a signed article Wednesday.
					
					 The article says:
					
					 The DPRK has displayed its dignity to the world as the homeland of the Songun politics. It is thanks to leader Kim Jong Il, who turned the country into a world-level military power with his most scientific and original political philosophy in the era of independence and distinguished leadership art.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided eternal foundations for the final victory of the Songun revolutionary cause in our country.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun policy shaped by him, the DPRK could courageously overcome unprecedented hardships in the 1990s and the new century and defend socialism and dynamically advance the building of a thriving nation, emerging victorious in the life-and-death struggle with the imperialists.
					
					 The historic experience of the Korean revolution and the present reality of world politics go to clearly prove the great validity and vitality of the Songun political mode, provided by Kim Jong Il, and its might.
					
					 The WPK's Songun policy is now developing in depth under the guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His energetic guidance over the Songun revolution ensures durable peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and serves as a treasured sword of invincibility for the Korean army and people in building a thriving nation and for progressive mankind advancing along the road of independence.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Scuppering Opportunity of Mending North-South Relations
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Scuppering Opportunity of Mending North-South Relations
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The international community remembers well that the south Korean chief executive talked volumes about north-south dialogue and unification during her foreign trips.
					 Had this expressed her true intention, there would have been no reason for her to say no to the just demand made by the DPRK to the south Korean authorities for halting the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations desperately kicked up by human scum, pushing the situation to an extreme pitch.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities scuppered the hard-won opportunity of mending the north-south relations by conniving and patronizing the leaflet scattering operations hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system.
					
					 Wicked human scum were stopped from conducting a leaflet scattering operation in the area of Phaju, Kyonggi Province on Oct. 25 by inhabitants there and south Korean organizations of various circles including progressive and social bodies. But these betes noires perpetrated another leaflet-scattering operation in the area of Phochon, Kyonggi Province on Oct. 31.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities again overlooked, connived and patronized the operation, talking about "freedom of expression" and repeating its claim that "there was no legal ground to halt it" and "it was an exercise of the right provided for by the constitution."
					
					 They dispatched puppet policemen to the spot to calm down the protest among people. But, they were busy protecting the safety of the human scum together with those from the Defense Security Command of the south Korean puppet army, far from checking the leaflet scattering operation. On the contrary, they arrested an inhabitant on the spot for the mere reason that he damaged balloons and leaflets and branded the protest of inhabitants in the area and members of civic organizations against the operation as a "riot of servants of the north."
					
					 This clearly indicates that the puppet authorities are the prime movers of the madcap leaflet scattering operations of human scum in south Korea.
					
					 As already disclosed, different ministries and agencies of the south Korean puppet regime are vying with each other to spend several millions of U.S. dollars for the leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 Military gangsters provided military backing to the leaflet scattering operations. Not only forefront units of the puppet army but also flying corps of its air force were put on emergency alert. 
					
					 It is nonsensical, indeed, to have dialogue and discuss the issue of improving the north-south relations with such black-hearted guys.
					
					 The puppet group is getting frantic in its anti-DPRK human rights racket in international arena in collusion with the U.S. and desperately hurling human scum into leaflet scattering operations as part of its confrontation ruckus. This is aimed to escalate the confrontation with the north and ignite a war.
					
					 It is an undeniable fact that the prospect of the north-south high-level contact remains gloomy though it had been high on agenda.
					
					 The leaflet scattering operations malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system are undisguisedly staged under the eyes of service personnel of the Korean People's Army. The puppet forces are not entitled to say anything when these operations are subject to such merciless physical countermeasure as opening sighting fire to foil them.
					
					 The above-said crimes of the puppet group against reunification, the nation and ethics deserve condemnation and punishment by all Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Shunning Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Shunning Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a statement on Nov. 1 denouncing the south Korean puppet group for turning its face away from the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The statement recalled that the "government" advanced nothing but a ridiculous special bill on the ferry Sewol which totally ignored the opinions of the bereaved families, far from probing the truth about the disaster though 200 days have passed since it.
					
					 It is hard to expect the probe into the truth and any measure for preventing the recurrence of similar disaster from this special bill, it held.
					
					 The chief executive is afraid of the probe into the truth about the disaster, it said, urging her to throw away into a dumping ground the special bill on the ferry Sewol and make another bill.

articles.title: Crimes Grow in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes Grow in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Crimes increase day by day in south Korea, sparking off serious concern, according to KBS of south Korea on November 2.
					 The puppet Supreme Prosecutor's Office report showed that at least 2 006 000 cases of crimes occurred in south Korea last year, an increase of 3.2 percent over the previous year.
					
					 Sexual violence reaches 74 cases on a daily average.
					
					 Crimes are rampant among public servants of ministries and agencies of the "government" and the crimes by those under the Police Agency, in particular, account for nearly half of the total crimes by public servants.
					
					 This tragic reality of the south Korean society is an inevitable result of the present ruling quarters' unpopular policies.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on Oct. 23 and 27 to commemorate the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a seminar on Marshal Kim Jong Un's work by the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, a seminar on the Juche idea by the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies and a book and photo exhibition by the Gorj County Committee of the Socialist Party of Romania.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibition were photos documenting the great life and undying exploits of Kim Jong Il. Also on display were works of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books and photos showing the true picture of the DPRK prospering under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Aba Sadik Abubakr, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, said at the seminar on Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution":
					
					 The Songun revolutionary idea provides scientific and practical solutions to the vital problems for the victory of revolution on the basis of the Juche-oriented revolutionary principle that arms decide the victory of the revolutionary cause.
					
					 It is a new revolutionary theory clarified by the Songun idea that the revolutionary struggle and construction should be carried on triumphantly with the revolutionary army as a driving force.
					
					 N. Dorjsuren, chairman of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun, said that Kim Jong Il's sudden demise during his field guidance was a great loss to not only the Korean people but also the progressive humankind.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization on Scientific Socialism
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization on Scientific Socialism
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article on its website on Oct. 23 to mark the 20th publication anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 The article noted that this important work was published to show the way to a new upsurge and certain victory for the socialist movement which had been in distress across the world.
					
					 Giving the detailed gist of the work, the article said:
					
					 The validity and vitality of the work "Socialism Is a Science" have been fully displayed for two decades since its publication.
					
					 With this work, many people could have hope for socialism and the socialist movement gained a fresh momentum across the world.
					
					 The reality proves that socialism is a science and truth and it is the law of historical development that mankind aspires socialism whereas the theory of "ended socialism" touted by the imperialists and their mouthpieces is deceptive.
					
					 Socialism is a science and it is sure to emerge victorious.

articles.title: Peruvians Hit at U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
Peruvians Hit at U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru issued a statement on Oct. 30 to denounce the U.S. and its followers for their anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers attempt to adopt a "resolution" at the UN General Assembly, taking issue with the DPRK over the non-existent "human rights issue".
					
					 They are denying the stark fact that genuine human rights are guaranteed in the DPRK. But they should clearly know that sunbeams can never be covered with palm.
					
					 We resolutely denounce all the hostile acts of hurting the dignity of the DPRK and the Korean-style socialist system which most satisfactorily guarantee the rights of the popular masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Peruvian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Peruvian Website
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was posted on the Internet on Oct. 29 jointly by the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute.
					 The work, published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the Juche-oriented theory of socialism is the most scientific and vital one and the principled problems arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work, Banner for World Revolutionaries: Peruvians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work, Banner for World Revolutionaries: Peruvians
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute issued a joint statement on Oct. 29 to mark the 20th publication anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il published a historic work "Socialism Is a Science" on Nov. 1, 1994.
					
					 In the work he elucidated the essence of genuine socialism and its advantages and inevitability of its victory and disclosed the reactionary nature and injustice of the imperialists and socialist renegades' moves to defame and stifle socialism.
					
					 His work has served as a banner for the popular masses the world over, the world revolutionaries in the struggle for socialism and independence against imperialism.
					
					 We pay deep homage to Kim Jong Il on the 20th publication anniversary of his work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en III Conferencia de Jefes e Instructores Politicos de Batallon de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en III Conferencia de Jefes e Instructores Politicos de Batallon de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 3 y 4 en esta capital la III Conferencia de Jefes e Instructores Politicos de Batallon del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El certamen tiene gran importancia en defender y glorificar la idea de dar importancia al batallon de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y sus hazanas de construccion del ejercito, preparar un nuevo jalon del fortalecimiento del batallon conforme a la demanda de la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, exhortar a todo el ejercito a la lucha por convertir los batallones del EPC en las filas de vanguardistas de flor y nata en la defensa a ultranza al lider y abrir la era dorada para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares.
					
					En la cita participaron Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong y otros comandantes del EPC, los jefes e instructores politicos de batallon, etc.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un salio al salon de la conferencia.
					
					El envio saludo cordial a los participantes respondiendo con una mano alzada a las aclamaciones de los participantes.
					
					El informe de la conferencia estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El informante senalo que en la historia de la revolucion del Songun explorada y avanzada con los fusiles bajo la bandera de la idea Juche estan impregnados los incansables trabajos y la benevolencia de los grandes hombres  del monte Paektu y continuo:
					
					El Generalisimo Kim Il Sung preparo en el periodo de la guerra sangrienta antijaponesa la noble tradicion para el fortalecimiento del batallon y presto primordial atencion a fortalecer en lo politico y militar el batallon desde los primeres dias de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					Durante  la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria el Presidente envio a numerosos combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses como comandantes de batallon para que el batallon cumpliera con su papel en lograr la victoria de guerra.
					
					El Generalisimo Kim Jong Il dio la explicacion original de que el batallon es la unidad de mando de base y de combate principal y de vida independiente del EPC y presento la idea de dar importancia al batallon de que al fortalecerse el batallon se consolidara por todos los medios la combatividad general del EPC.
					
					En la II Conferencia de Jefes e Instructores Politicos de Batallon del EPC presento como deber principal de ellos convertir el batallon en la fila selecta de combate y dirigio para que ellos convirtieran todos los batallones en las filas de combate capaces de aniquilar uno contra cien enemigos siendo protagonistas principales y dos pilares del fortalecimiento del batallon.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un la idea de dar importancia al batallon y las hazanas de construccion del ejercito de los Generalisimos se llevan adelante con brillantez en la nueva etapa mas alta.
					
					Sera radiante el porvenir de la RPDC y cierta la victoria final por enaltecer al Comandante Supremo al frente de la revolucion de Songun.
					
					Seguidamente, hubo intervenciones de generales y oficiales del EPC.
					
					Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso en la conferencia.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que esta conferencia sirve de un motivo trascendental para preparar el jalon importante en materializar cabalmente en la construccion y las actividades del ejercito la idea de dar importancia al batallon de los Generalisimos y abrir la era dorada del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares.
					
					Subrayo sobre la posicion y la importancia del deber del batallon en fortalecer las fuerzas militares.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas para convertir todos los batallones en las invencibles filas selectas capaces de aniquilar de un golpe a cualesquier enemigos y en las  aldeas de la tierra natal de los soldados ligadas con el Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Se refirio a  la necesidad de mejorar de continuo los contenidos y los modos de ejercicios conforme a la idea militar estrategica y tactica de Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y los metodos de combate del Juche, los deberes de combate de las unidades y subunidades y la demanda de la guerra moderna.
					
					Dijo que los oficiales deben asimilar la concepcion de soldados del Dirigente y atender cordialmente a los militares con afecto maternal.
					
					Enfatizo que se debe elevar decisivamente la responsabilidad y el papel de los jefes e instructores politicos de batallon para fortalecerlo.
					
					Senalo que ellos deben trabajar dando hincapie a fortalecer la compania y agrego que el batallon y la compania son igual a un organismo y el fortalecimiento de la compania es precisamente el del batallon.
					
					Presento como remedio importante para imprimir nuevo cambio en el fortalecimiento del batallon dinamizar el movimiento masivo y la emulacion.
					
					Senalo que todo el ejercito debe apreciar y ayudar bien al batallon, hacer selectas las filas de sus jefes e instructores politicos, presentarlos y evaluarlos bien y resolver con responsabilidad los problemas surgidos en las labores del batallon.
					
					Debemos grabar en nuestros corazones la consigna de los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses "!No abandone la conviccion revolucionaria aunque se muera!" y ella nos hace sentir hasta hoy las palpitaciones de ellos, dijo y exhorto encarecidamente a luchar tenazmente con la fe indoblegable para acoger lo mas pronto posible el dia en que se cumpla con exito la revolucion coreana transcurrida bajo la guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Comandante Supremo concluyo su discurso.
					
					Los comandantes del batallon que dedicaron todo lo suyo al fortalecimiento de su unidad militar son patriotas y heroes desconocidos y el CC del PTC esta muy orgulloso de tener a tales companeros y decidio concederles altas condecoraciones aprovechando este conclave, informo el Mariscal.
					
					El jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, dio lectura al decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Kim Jong Un otorgo personalmente el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC, la medalla de oro (el Martillo y la Hoz) y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase a estos comandantes del batallon: los oficiales del EPC Pang Kyong Chol, Choe Tong Yun, Han Chol Su, Kim Chol Ho y Sin Ye Gun quienes realizaron meritos excepcionales.
					
					Al final, expreso la conviccion de que todos los jefes e instructores politicos de batallon recompensaran la esperanza del partido al fortalecer mas el batallon, principal unidad de combate del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se retrata con jefes e instructores politicos de batallon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se retrata con jefes e instructores politicos de batallon
						
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo el dia 4 las fotos de recuerdo con los participantes en la III Conferencia de Jefes e Instructores Politicos de Batallon del EPC.
					Envio cordial saludo a los participantes respondiendo a las aclamaciones de ellos que siendo duenos y pilares gemelos del batallon, trabajan con toda su inteligencia, fuerza y pasion para fortalecer el batallon en lo politico y militar y acondicionarlo como poblado natal de los soldados.
					
					Felicito calidamente a los participantes que celebraron exitosamente la conferencia con alta conciencia politica y entusiasmo revolucionario, diciendo que esa reunion sesionada por tercera vez en la historia de construccion del ejercito deviene una ocasion significativa que ha preparado importante jalon para abrir la era dorada de fortalecimiento de los batallones elevando por todos los medios su poderio politico y militar bajo la bandera de transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					Se fotografio junto con los jefes e instructores politicos de batallon expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran con su honrosa mision y papel en las labores para convertir el batallon, conforme al proposito del partido, en las filas de flor y nata y en las aldeas natales colindadas con el CC del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron en la filmacion Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y otros comandantes del EPC y los comandantes de las unidades de tipos de ejercito y de nivel de cuerpo.

articles.title: Se realizara en RPDC labor para coleccionar y descubrir sellos y sus vestigios
articles.content:
Se realizara en RPDC labor para coleccionar y descubrir sellos y sus vestigios
Pyongyang, 5 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Se realizara en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la labor de coleccion y descubrimiento de sellos y vestigios relacionados con estos.
					Entre ellos figuran los sellos usados o no en varias epocas de Corea, postales, sobrecartas, libros y datos referentes a sellos, estampas, uniformes de carteros, maletines de correos, fotos relacionados con la casa de correos, buzon, transportes de correos, equipos y aparatos de impresion usados para editar los sellos.
					
					Tambien se coleccionara varias reliquias y fotos usadas en distintas decadas por los correos y carteros de distintas localidades y los  sellos y los vestigios relacionados con estos conservados por los organos correspondientes, los filatelistas individuales y los trabajadores.
					
					Para enviar los vestigios coleccionados hay que enlazar con el Museo de Sellos de Corea.
